Name: Grandpa's Cheese
About the game: Grandpa has gone mad! collect the cheese and give them to Reeze so he can feed his mouse to get the hell out of the house! This is a horror fps game that puts you in the shoes of a random guy that has no name, who wakes up in your grandpa's house. He has gone made and you have to move around the house to collect the cheese, and give them to your step brother Rezee to get the key to open the front door. This is a joke game made by me, Vander in one day! I used suggestions from my Discord server and made this horrible game :D
